lines previously sung by     It is said on  that Timmy was born with a crippling condition described as being a strange combination of palsy and Tourettes   first  in  his three scenes in the  having little relevance to the central plot  originally wanted to remove him from the  in fear of potential controversy over the inclusion of a mentally handicapped characterTrey Parker Matt Stone  South Park  The Complete Fourth Season DVD By Comedy Central Minicommentary for  The Tooth Fairy Tats  Series creators  and  pushed to keep the character in the story with their basis being that although Timmy is different the other children in the series treat him equally  Timmy was originally intended only for that  but proved so popular that he was given his own story three s later in  where he becomes the lead singer of a successful band originally titled  later titled Timmy and the Lords of the Underworld despite his limited vocabulary Throughout the   complains that Timmy is being exploited although he achieves extreme popularity The message delivered at the end of the  is that there is nothing wrong with the situation given that Timmy enjoys playing music and his audiences enjoy listening to him   See  and    Assault  In  he and  physically fought over a dispute about Jimmys comedy   Timmy wears a red sweater and blue jeans His head is deformed at the top and he has strawberry blonde hair He is almost always  sitting in a black wheelchair and is usually smiling openly and fidgeting with his hands  During the metrosexual fad in the   he wears a light blue unbuttoned shirt gelled hair brown work shoes and a purpleandpink wheelchair with a rainbow band     FilethumbTimmy fighting  in  Timmy was originally described as being somewhat mentally handicapped but over time his character has become described less as such and more often as disabled In various s such as  he  to be quite cognizant intelligent and principled In  and  he  to have no trouble operating a computer and in the former he even comes up with a clever plan to get Jimmy kicked out of the scouts He  to have hydrocephalus as well as involuntary movements  Despite his disabilities Timmy is treated fairly amongst his classmates at school In  Timmy makes the top ten finalists in the boys competition for their new friend although he is disqualified as  claims he is selfcentred He is also used by the boys as a cameraman for their band in  which he failed at and as a test subject for their time machine in  which backfired    Timmy has parents named  and  Their surname is Burch revealed in  and they have the same disability as Timmy in that they can mainly only say their own names and they are confined to wheelchairs They also have swollen heads This implies that Timmys disorder is hereditary  Richard wears an oldfashioned red jacket with a white shirt underneath and blue jeans He has a crop of brown hair on top of his head His head seems to slump down a little Helen wears a turquoise jacket and a lilacgrey skirt Her hair is orange and shoulder length  A picture on their wall indicates that Timmy Richard and Helen have been to Paris   Gobbles was Timmys disabled pet turkey that appeared in the    Timmy bought Gobbles for fifty dollars from  After overcoming various hardships despite their disabilities Timmy and Gobbles formed a deep bond    Timmy is friends with South Parks other disabled character  who is able to understand what Timmy is saying In the first  in which Jimmy   Timmy is intensely jealous of him and even tries to have him killed by giving him a parka like s Eventually the two make amends and are shown hanging out together  This relationship was strained however in  when Timmy discovered that Jimmy was using steroids to cheat in the Special Olympics The two once again make amends when Jimmy does the right thing by telling the truth   In the   it is revealed that Timmys chair is named Lil RunAbout In the   a jointsmoking man who eerily resembles Timmy rolls by in a wheelchair during Randy Marsh and Sharon Marshs Woodstock flashback  perhaps Timmys father or another older male relative Timmys name and the way he says it maybe a play on the Japanese word tem  a very rude way of saying you used chiefly by male speakers and when the speaker is angry  is fluent in the Japanese language Timmy played a Priest during  Although Timmy has an askew face he is not considered one of  The same is true for  In  he was given the last name Burch Timmys Iron Maiden costume bears a slight resemblance to the historical torture device of the same name which is now believed to be an entirely fictitious device Timmy is apparently aware of Kennys constant deaths he gives Jimmy a parka exactly like Kennys in the hopes that he would die He probably did not tell Kenny he was aware of his common deaths in  because he can only say his own name Despite being in a wheelchair Timmy is  swimming in Up the Down Steroid where he glares at Jimmy winning the swimming competition while floating in the water During the  intro as the animator designs the boys with construction paper while clips from s play Timmy can be  in construction paper form This makes him the only character who was designed with construction paper after  which was the only  to use the animation technique Timmys superhero alterego in  Doctor Timothy is a parody of  Professor X from the  XMen franchise In  he  to be wearing his Mecha Timmy costume from    Being a highly popular character Timmy has been received very well by the South Park community It was  that he is more popular among disabled people based on the voters who voted Timmy for Ouch s The Greatest Disabled TV Character poll Jeff Shannon when commenting on Timmy said Timmy  at first glance to uphold the condescending disability stereotypes that are gradually fading from mainstream entertainment But like everything else in South Park hes actually challenging preconceptions toppling taboos and weaving his singularity into the fabric of the show Timmy of South Park challenges viewers attitudes about people with disabilities Shannon Jeff November   The Seattle Times The Seattle Times Company When Comedy Central first heard of Timmy they were against the idea After Timmy appeared in  and fans were ecstatic Comedy Central according to Trey Parker were eager to have Timmy appear again  IGN ranked Timmy second in a list of the Top  South Park Peripheral Characters commenting that South Parks most controversial character may be one of the funniest and most enduringIverson Dan Zoromski Brian   Top  South Park Peripheral CharactersIGN IGN Entertainment  In Doug Pratts DVD Movies Television Music Art Adult and More author Douglas Pratt describes Timmys use of different inflections to express his mood all the while saying nothing but his name as amusing although he adds that some may disagreeDoug Pratts DVD Movies Television Music Art Adult and More By Douglas Pratt Published by UNET  Corporation  ISBN ISBN  Page   M Keith Booker author of Drawn to television primetime animation from the Flintstones to Family Guy describes Timmy as arguably being the most controversial of the secondary characters in the seriesDrawn to television primetime animation from the Flintstones to Family guy By M Keith Booker Published by Greenwood Publishing Group  ISBN  ISBN  Page   According to Trey Parker soon after the characters debut he observed that fans of the series began shouting Timmy in an imitation of the character as opposed to their earlier imitations of the character  and their usage of other popular catchphrases on the show  Despite Timmys fame during his initial seasons on the show his role has declined considerably without a single line of dialogue between  and  having been replaced by  Trey Parker noted in a  interview he tries to avoid using characters like  and Timmy because viewers could not understand their dialogue Despite this decline Timmy has made somewhat of a comeback and appeared in several s in the fourteenth and fifteenth seasons   Due to the popularity of South Park Timmys exclamation TIMMEH soon entered into pop culture as an outburst used to describe chide or respond to moments of extreme uncoordination lack of concentration or other losses of logic sense or reason There are many other ways in which the exclamation is referenced such as The popular MMORPG World of Warcraft features the character  Timmy the Cruel in the Stratholme instance who yells TIMMY when he  On ESPNs Sports Center anchors yell TIMMY whenever a Tim Duncan highlight is shown During the intro to Sailor by The Brian Jonestown Massacre members of the band can be heard doing Timmy impressions Buffalo Sabres fans often refer to centre Tim Connolly known for his prolonged absences due to injury as Timmah a reference to the character Rapper Ludacris referenced Timmy in a guest verse on Missy Elliots song Gossip Folks Im Ludacris living loud sic like Timmy In January  British metal band Siren Lake named their van Timmy in homage to the character This has gained them a huge amount of media coverage including an appearance on Peter Snows Newsnight In the  music video game  one of the unlockable bonus tracks is Timmy and the Lords of the Underworld featuring a fulllength version of the song used in  In the  video game  a dungeon features a series of clones named  who like Timmy can only speak their own name While they are not wheelchairbound they are insane and will attack on sight using their tone of voice while speaking their name to indicate emotion In the film  also created by Matt Stone and Trey Parker features celebrity Matt Damon who is portrayed as being mentally handicapped and capable of only saying his name This was done because his puppet came out as looking handicapped so they went with it     Helps Stan Cartman and Kyle try to pull Kennys tooth out Is then later  driving his wheelchair over the bridge Kenny was thrown down from during the end credits   Unnecessarily diagnosed with ADD along with all the other children of South Park He then joins the band The Lords of the Underworld which becomes an overnight sensation   Timmy is named dream boy of the decade by NAMBLA member   Helps with Stans plan to get Cartmans kidney   Timmy films Fingerbangs playground show wheelchair which ends up going terribly wrong He ends up in prehistoric times but returns later on   Gets the lead part in the Thanksgiving musical play and finds a crippled pet turkey which he names Gobbles and learns to say his name Timmy greatly admires Gobbles He even goes far enough to jump in front of a bullet aiming for Gobbles   Timmy learns how to say shit   Becomes envious of Jimmys popularity at scouts and fights him in an alley After the fight which was a tie Timmy uses his computer to make a photo with Jimmys head atop a nude mans body embracing another nude man This causes Jimmy to be kicked out of the scouts due to its no homosexual law   At Cartmans meeting   Allowed in Cartmans theme park   Timmy needs help putting his condom on   Seen in the classroom   Auditions to Mountain Pass level to inform the player to move on to Downtown South Park for the final battle along with  He is in the same Medictype class as   and  moving quickly but dealing minimal damage His special ability causes  to play and as long as it plays any enemy Timmy touches deals heavy damage or dies   Timmy makes a small appearance in the game where he serves as a fast travel system He only appointed leader for  He has the ability to read peoples minds and has multiple speaking lines During combat he has the ability to brainwash characters to pit them against their own teammates He develops a franchise plan intended to satisfy all members of  as well as his team so all characters may have their own film   He also re in the DLC  to assist Jimmy in looking for the counselors to
